step_of_the_day.title:
Connecting with your passion and your excitement. You will learn better if your efforts are accompanied by
            positive emotions (Pillar #6)
step_of_the_day.content:
The statements I wrote above, make two important points for todayâ€™s step. The first is that when you
            experience passion and excitement, this puts you on The Path. It helps you engage more deeply with life. And
            the second is that when you touch into your passion and excitement, whatever you are trying to learn, you
            will learn faster and better. This has been demonstrated in countless research studies. This positive
            activation you bring to the process mobilizes your brain to be more focused and effective in growing.

action_step:
Identify something that you are passionate about today. Appreciate and let yourself feel the excitement
            associated with this passion. Apply this energy to some learning or training that you are currently involved
            in to advance your passion.
journal_entry: Write about the passion you have and how it helps to animate your life.
